snippet: William Laverack Jr., head of a private investment firm, is closely linked to a $250,000 contribution to a pro-Romney "super PAC."
abstract: William Laverack Jr., head of a private investment firm, is closely linked to a $250,000 contribution to a pro-Romney "super PAC."

headline.main: Through a Web Site Under Construction, a Secret Donor Is Revealed
headline.print_headline: A Likely Name For a Mystery Donor
